cards.title: Combat Cyborg
body: Reduce damage dealt to environment targets by 2.
At the end of the environment turn, this card deals non-environment the target with the lowest HP {H-2} projectile damage.
cards.flavorText: “Now that's my kind of possible future!” said Unity.{BR}Omnitron-X grabbed her wrist and{BR}began retreating. “Please Accompany me if you wish to survive.”

cards.title: Heart of the Wanderer
body: When this card enters play, reveal the top card of each deck in turn order and either discard it or replace it.
At the end of the environment turn, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: “I think...it's showing us things to{BR}come,” said Cricket. Haka looked{BR}around nervously. “Does anyone{BR}else hear a heartbeat?”

cards.title: Paradox Intrusion
body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the hero target with the highest HP {H} energy damage.
Then, this card deals X villain targets 2 energy damage each, where x is the number of time vortex cards in the environment trash.
cards.flavorText: “The way I hear it, some things ain't{BR}supposed to exist,” said Chrono-Ranger.{BR}“Problem is, when they intersect this{BR}crystal thing, they [b]DO[/b].”

cards.title: Prehistoric Behemoth
body: This card is immune to damage dealt by targets with less than 10HP.
At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the {H - 2} hero target with the highest HP 2 melee damage each.
cards.flavorText: The timeship attracts everything that{BR}might have been, including denizens{BR}of a potential world whose ice{BR}age never ended.

cards.title: Superimposed Realities
body: Play this card next to a hero.
Whenever another hero would play a card, use a power, or draw a card, instead the hero next to this card does that respective action
At the start of the environment turn, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: As the ship crashed through the shards of{BR}multiple realities, the Stranger felt each{BR}version of himself pass, and knew the{BR}choices that had cost each of them dearly.

cards.title: Temporal Acceleration
body: When this card enters play, play the top card of the villain deck. Then, play the top card of each hero deck in turn order.
At the end of the environment turn, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: The FSC “Continuance Wanderer” possessed no{BR}conventional propulsion. instead its crystal{BR}hull bent reality, speeding up the universe{BR}around and, occasionally, inside it.

cards.title: Temporal Reset
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other environment cards. Then shuffle 2 cards from each trash pile back into their deck, and each non-character target regains {H} HP.
At the end of the environment turn, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: The younger Legacy stared at the{BR}enormous crystal embedded in its{BR}framework of sculpted metal and{BR}wondered, “What if?”

cards.title: Temporal Reversal
body: When this card enters play, place 1 card in play from each other deck back on top of that deck.
At the end of the environment turn, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: “What happened?” Fanatic asked as{BR}she stumbled against the bulkhead.{BR}“Another chance to make the same{BR}mistakes,” replied Baccarat.

cards.title: Temporal Slipstream
body: When this card enters play, each player discards their hand and draws that many cards.
At the end of the environment turn, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: Defects in the chronospherical lattice{BR}throughout the corridors caused random{BR}divergences in the local timestream. Not{BR}even Vanish could escape them.

cards.title: Time Freeze
body: Play this card next to a hero.
That hero skips their turns, and targets in their play are are immune to damage.
At the start of the environment turn, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: Blade's minions stared at the giant{BR}golem, which had suddenly stopped{BR}moving. “What are you doing?!{BR}Attack it!” their captain shouted.

cards.title: Vortex Glitch
body: Players may not play one-shots.
When another environment card enters play, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: As the timeship's call resonated through the{BR}fabric of reality, those beings contaminated by{BR}temporal anomalies were pulled into it. Not all{BR}of them arrived in one piece.

cards.title: Vortex Interference
body: Whenever a hero uses a power, destroy 1 hero ongoing or equipment card.
When another environment card enters play, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: Unity studied the ship’s schematics. “The{BR}crystal's a link to an unstable chrono-spatial{BR}rift. The inside is actually a pocket of another{BR}dimension. And it's bigger than the outside.”

cards.title: Vortex Surge
body: Whenever a hero card is drawn, 1 player must discard a card.
When another environment card enters play, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: I don't know how F.I.L.T.E.R. got their{BR}hands on this, but it could take you{BR}back to your time. If these temporal{BR}fluctuations don't kill us all first.
